short_summary: Services de consultance en informatique (Microsoft 365, Projet Microsoft & Business Dynamics)
description: The contract aims to provide IT consulting services for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP). The services will be provided to support the implementation of Microsoft 365, Projet Microsoft Dynamics and Business Dynamics for the RCMP. Additionally, the contract aims to engage two contractors who will work closely with the RCMP to support their business needs.
duration_in_months: They have not specified a set length, however they expect the project to span over a couple of years
full_summary:
======================

### M7594-231727 – Project Management Professional Services

#### Notice of Opportunity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for project management professional services under the solicitation number WS3960638812.

#### Solicitation Details

* **Amendment Number**: 10
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3960638812
* **Publication Date**: April 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 15, 2023 2:00 PM EDT (amended)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Description of Services

The selected contractor will provide professional services of both business and project management resources to support innovative, transformative, and digitally-enabled services and projects.

The scope of work includes:

* Provision of project management resources to support the delivery of projects and services
* Development and implementation of project management methodologies and processes
* Collaboration with stakeholders to ensure alignment with business goals and objectives
* Maintenance of project schedules, budgets, and resource allocation

#### Tendering Process

This solicitation is subject to competitive selective tendering under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP). The trade agreements listed below apply to this solicitation:

* CPTPP
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Evaluation Criteria

Tenders will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The highest combined rating will be selected.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Nathalie Hamelin, PSPC, at nathalie.hamelin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

#### Notice URL

The notice can be accessed online at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16132883?extsite=MTYxMzI4ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MD
